  • Podcast Episode 65 - Jeff "Cheezy" Morgan, Trainer and Developer

    Welcome to the Watir Podcast. In this episode of the Watir Podcast, Jeff “Cheezy” Morgan joins the Watir Podcast to talk about his Page Object gem, other significant gems used for Acceptance Test Driven Development, his book Cucumber & Cheeze, and agile. Twitter Works at LeanDog Gems: Page Objects Fig Newton Data Magic Service Mock Terminal Emulator Book: Cucumber & Cheeze Conference: Agile Days in Potsdam You can listen to this podcast at SoundCloud.

    Written by: David McNulla on December 4, 2016
